description:
Brain Challenge is a simple,
entertaining solution for stimulating
your neurons that goes way beyond
logic tests. With 48 mini-games, Brain
Challenge provides an exceptional
variety of exercises. Not only can you
train your brain for Maths but also for
4 other categories: Logic, Focus,
Memory and Visual! Improve your
resistance to stress or choose to relax
thanks to the 2 extra modes: Stress
and Creativity. Plus, you can now
personalize your profile and some
exercises with your own photos!
name: Brain Challenge®
